chapters.description: Understanding the philosophy, principles, and history of DevOps.
chapters.goal: Define DevOps and its core values.
chapters.mini_project: Research and present a case study of a successful DevOps implementation.

chapters.description: Learning the basics of Git, branching, merging, and collaboration.
chapters.goal: Effectively use Git for code management.
chapters.mini_project: Create a simple repository on GitHub and practice Git workflows.

chapters.description: Understanding the CI/CD pipeline, automation tools, and deployment strategies.
chapters.goal: Describe the CI/CD process and its benefits.
chapters.mini_project: Set up a basic CI/CD pipeline for a small project using a tool like Jenkins or CircleCI.

chapters.description: Exploring the concept of IaC, benefits, and common tools.
chapters.mini_project: Create a simple infrastructure configuration using Terraform.

chapters.description: Understanding Docker, building, and running containers, and managing Docker images.
chapters.goal: Build, run, and manage Docker containers.
chapters.mini_project: Containerize a simple web application using Docker.

chapters.description: Introduction to Kubernetes, pods, deployments, services, and basic Kubernetes operations.
chapters.goal: Deploy and manage containerized applications using Kubernetes.
chapters.mini_project: Deploy a simple application on a Kubernetes cluster.

chapters.description: Exploring various monitoring tools, metrics, and dashboards.
chapters.goal: Understand key monitoring concepts and tools.
chapters.mini_project: Set up a basic monitoring system for a simple application.

chapters.description: Learning different logging approaches, log analysis tools, and troubleshooting techniques.
chapters.goal: Effectively collect, analyze, and utilize application logs.
chapters.mini_project: Implement logging in a small application and analyze the logs using a tool like Logstash or Fluentd.

chapters.description: Understanding performance bottlenecks, profiling techniques, and optimization strategies.
chapters.goal: Identify and address performance issues in applications.
chapters.mini_project: Profile a simple application and identify areas for performance improvement.
